body: Hi Yasaman, Check importEPW component for hourly totalSkyCover. I'm not sure if you can find the data for the air pollution in a day in the weather file. You can read more about the data in an epw file from this link: [http://apps1.eere.energy.gov/buildings/energyplus/pdfs/auxiliarypro...](http://apps1.eere.energy.gov/buildings/energyplus/pdfs/auxiliaryprograms.pdf)
